programme.title: Titanic
Titanic
programme.desc:
Titanic: Directed by James Cameron. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates. A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120338/","name":"Titanic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDdmZGU3NDQtY2E5My00ZTliLWIzOTUtMTY4ZGI1YjdiNjk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120338/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DrLenera"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Despite some glaring faults,Cameron's mixing of romance with real life disaster is still impressive and occasionally brilliant","reviewBody":"It's really quite odd. When Titanic first came out,the reviews were mixed but the public generally loved it,those who disliked the film were definitely in the minority. Over the years,it has became somewhat fashionable to slag Titanic off,even if a great many of those people who did so were probably amongst those who made it such an enormous hit in the cinemas. Titanic is flawed,definitely,sometimes greatly so. However,it's also a tremendous achievement for it's director James Cameron. Mixing a real disaster with romance is harder to do than some might think. Maybe he did have a right to say "I'm king of the world" when the film won Best Picture at the Oscars. Just once.

The modern day opening is excellent,making effective use of some of Cameron's real footage he took of the sunken Titanic. There is a real sense of mystery. Than we flash back to the Titanic being boarded,and the film stalls just a little for around two hours. The attention to detail is amazing {even all the cutlery matched,you know} and there is nothing wrong with an extremely slow build up to action-think of The Seven Samourai. However,the central romance between Leo and Kate is often badly written and unconvincing. For a start Kate's Rose would certainly not have done two things she does in the film as quickly as she did {Obviously thousands of teenage girls seeing the film in 1997 would disagree with my views}. We also have to suffer Cameron constantly labouring the point that the poor people on the ship are better than the rich people.

However,the final 80 or so minutes,detailing the sinking,is simply brilliant film making. The suspense is built expertly,even though we know what will happen,and climaxes with some technical shots which are still impressive. Perhaps there is a little two much emphasis on the central couple,but there are some truly moving moments,and it really feels true,although of course Cameron did play with the facts a little here and there,as at least one descendant of one of the survivors has pointed out. The following sequence involving the boats is extremely haunting,with some especially good use of sound. As for the final scene,it does manage to be pretty moving,it's schmaltzy but it works {though hardly original,think of Somewhere In Time and various 40s romantic fantasies}.

Titanic has some excellent use of CGI {watch out for the transitions from present to the past on the sunken ship} and one glaringly bad special effect-the iceberg which looks like polystyrene. James Horner's best selling score is really quite poor and only occasionally brings the emotion it should do. Performances are generally excellent and sometimes succeed in overcoming some thin characterisation {such as Billy Zane as Rose's fiancée,who even has to suffer with far too much eye make up!}

Overall Titanic is still worth seeing,and sometimes it really does hit the heights that it should. It succeeds more than it fails,which is impressive in a film as ambitious as this."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1090748,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"keywords":"iceberg,sailor's death,mass death,sea captain,love affair","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3D Release","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi907189785","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzczNjA2MTY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTgyNDY2NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzczNjA2MTY5M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTgyNDY2NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the new trailer for James Cameron's Academy Award winning blockbuster, coming to theaters in 3D. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000708/","name":"Billy Zane"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"duration":"PT3H14M"}</script><metacontent="

Iniciales S.G.
programme.desc:
Initials SG: Directed by Rania Attieh, Daniel Garcia. With Diego Peretti, Julianne Nicholson, Daniel Fanego, Francisco Lumerman. An aging, Argentine, Serge Gainsbourg wannabe struggles to deal with a career he can't seem to get on track, an affair he doesn't want and a crime he didn't mean to commit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9080672/","name":"Initials SG","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDcyNWFjNjktNzFkZC00NzI4LThkYTMtNjY5ZWZlYzI4ZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, Argentine, Serge Gainsbourg wannabe struggles to deal with a career he can't seem to get on track, an affair he doesn't want and a crime he didn't mean to commit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9080672/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hof-4"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Total miss","reviewBody":"The subject: Sergio Garcés (Diego Peretti), an aging porno actor is trying (mostly unsuccessfully) to find a place, however humble, in mainstream cinema. He shares initials with Serge Gainsbourg and counts among his accomplishments Spanish versions of Gainsbourg songs. His friends call him Francés, Frenchman. He has problems managing his anger; he had brushes with the law, has been sentenced to community service and is one short step away from doing time. A subject that has obvious possibilities in the hands of a competent scriptwriter.

Peretti is a capable and experienced actor with a flair for comedy which bodes well for the subject. Unfortunately, expectations are frustrated. The first part of the movie is devoid of wit (except perhaps for the first scene) and Peretti is wasted. So is Julianne Nicholson, saddled with a thankless role; her presence in Buenos Aires is never explained and she seems to be around just to lust for Sergio. But the worst is yet to come; midway through, the movie jumps awkwardly into the crime genre and all credibility is thrown overboard.

The final insult: Gainsbourg's songs are sappy enough, but their River Plate versions are much worse. The movie fails at all levels.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":284,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2019-09-19","keywords":"reference to serge gainsbourg,male protagonist,violence,sauna,year 2014","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0673391/","name":"Diego Peretti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0629855/","name":"Julianne Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266723/","name":"Daniel Fanego"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4275547/","name":"Rania Attieh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2525426/","name":"Daniel Garcia"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0481533/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0419254/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0732895/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4275547/","name":"Rania Attieh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2525426/","name":"Daniel Garcia"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 9080672, Title: Initials SG, --- Description: Initials SG: Directed by Rania Attieh, Daniel Garcia. With Diego Peretti, Julianne Nicholson, Daniel Fanego, Francisco Lumerman. An aging, Argentine, Serge Gainsbourg wannabe struggles to deal with a career he can't seem to get on track, an affair he doesn't want and a crime he didn't mean to commit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9080672/","name":"Initials SG","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDcyNWFjNjktNzFkZC00NzI4LThkYTMtNjY5ZWZlYzI4ZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, Argentine, Serge Gainsbourg wannabe struggles to deal with a career he can't seem to get on track, an affair he doesn't want and a crime he didn't mean to commit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9080672/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"hof-4","dateCreated":"2020-12-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Total miss","reviewBody":"The subject: Sergio Garcés (Diego Peretti), an aging porno actor is trying (mostly unsuccessfully) to find a place, however humble, in mainstream cinema. He shares initials with Serge Gainsbourg and counts among his accomplishments Spanish versions of Gainsbourg songs. His friends call him Francés, Frenchman. He has problems managing his anger; he had brushes with the law, has been sentenced to community service and is one short step away from doing time. A subject that has obvious possibilities in the hands of a competent scriptwriter.

Peretti is a capable and experienced actor with a flair for comedy which bodes well for the subject. Unfortunately, expectations are frustrated. The first part of the movie is devoid of wit (except perhaps for the first scene) and Peretti is wasted. So is Julianne Nicholson, saddled with a thankless role; her presence in Buenos Aires is never explained and she seems to be around just to lust for Sergio. But the worst is yet to come; midway through, the movie jumps awkwardly into the crime genre and all credibility is thrown overboard.

The final insult: Gainsbourg's songs are sappy enough, but their River Plate versions are much worse. Tucked
programme.desc:
Tucked: Directed by Jamie Patterson. With Derren Nesbitt, Jordan Stephens, April Pearson, Steve Oram. TUCKED is a raw and tender drama about an aging 80 year old drag queen who forms an unlikely friendship with a younger queen, both struggling with their own issues of gender identity and mortality. As they discover more about each other, they realize how to truly be themselves. programme.title: The Full Monty
Goło i wesoło
The Full Monty
programme.desc:
The Full Monty: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Wim Snape, Steve Huison. Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119164/","name":"The Full Monty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg0NWFjMTAtNGZjMC00NmZlLThhZDYtM2MzNTU2NDZiZDVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDUyOTUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"artistathome"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is an unbeatable movie! I saw it at the theater in 1997 along with about 7 other women...we all went to the theater alone because our hubbies refused to take us! Seriously...I did not know one single woman in the theater that day! We all loved the movie right off...

My sister bought it and we watched it with captioning, and boy had we missed a lot of lines at the theater and funny ones at that! You see with the English accents and all their slang-- you just can't understand a lot of what they are saying...

Watch this movie with and without the captioning! It's like watching a movie with English being your second language, and I B.S. you not!

The English working class has a different way of expressing themselves--its so charming and hilarious...

I think Robert Carlysle is brilliant "Gaz". I cannot think of anyone who could have done it better. 

This movie cannot be beat! I bought it and recommend it to everyone!! Definitely a ten out of ten."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-08-29","keywords":"steel worker,unemployment,male stripper,northern england,dole","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Full Monty","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi395116825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065001/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0119164, Title: The Full Monty, --- Description: The Full Monty: Directed by Peter Cattaneo. With Robert Carlyle, Mark Addy, Wim Snape, Steve Huison. Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119164/","name":"The Full Monty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg0NWFjMTAtNGZjMC00NmZlLThhZDYtM2MzNTU2NDZiZDVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDUyOTUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119164/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"artistathome","dateCreated":"2006-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great movie","reviewBody":"This is an unbeatable movie! I saw it at the theater in 1997 along with about 7 other women...we all went to the theater alone because our hubbies refused to take us! Seriously...I did not know one single woman in the theater that day! We all loved the movie right off...

My sister bought it and we watched it with captioning, and boy had we missed a lot of lines at the theater and funny ones at that! You see with the English accents and all their slang-- you just can't understand a lot of what they are saying...

Watch this movie with and without the captioning! It's like watching a movie with English being your second language, and I B.S. you not!

The English working class has a different way of expressing themselves--its so charming and hilarious...

I think Robert Carlysle is brilliant "Gaz". I cannot think of anyone who could have done it better. 

This movie cannot be beat! I bought it and recommend it to everyone!! Definitely a ten out of ten.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":102446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-08-29","keywords":"steel worker,unemployment,male stripper,northern england,dole","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Full Monty","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi395116825","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWJhOTk1ZjQtOGQyMC00NzcxLTg1ZTctYjA3ZTllMzA1MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Fox Searchlight Pictures","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004692/","name":"Mark Addy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146341/","name":"Peter Cattaneo"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065001/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0064479/","name":"Simon Beaufoy"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Quello che non sai di me: WT
To, czego o mnie nie wiesz
Quello che non sai di me
programme.desc: Quello che non sai di me: WT: Directed by Rolando Colla. With Francesco Cortopassi, Sara D'Amario, Cristian Izzo, Alfie Nze. Patricia and Ikendu meet in a town in Italian-speaking Switzerland. He comes from Mali, she's employed and the single mother of two daughters. He keeps silent about the reasons for his flight, but he's a fantastic cook and brings warmth and stability into the chaos that is Patricia's life. After their wedding, they live a carefree life, without asking each other too many questions. But one day, Ikendu is arrested and incriminated as a drug dealer by his co-defendants. Now, a difficult period begins for the couple. They both find out things they had previously hidden from one another. At times, this leaves them speechless, at others it causes violent arguments. They often don't understand the world any longer. Nonetheless their relationship takes an important step forward." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7805896/","name":"Quello che non sai di me: WT","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTFkODhlNTctMDRlMy00ZjlkLThlZjQtNWMwNzk4YWE1OWQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Patricia and Ikendu meet in a town in Italian-speaking Switzerland. programme.title: Spinster
Stara panna
Spinster
programme.desc:
Spinster: Directed by Andrea Dorfman. With Chelsea Peretti, Susan Kent, Nadia Tonen, Kate Lynch. After her partner breaks up with her on her 39th birthday, Gaby tackles her fears of loneliness as well as preconceptions of what it means for a woman to be single." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8452136/","name":"Spinster","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNzEyNTQtMWUxMC00MmZlLTllYzgtNDllN2I4Zjk0ZWFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzgyNzIwNzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After her partner breaks up with her on her 39th birthday, Gaby tackles her fears of loneliness as well as preconceptions of what it means for a woman to be single.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8452136/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnobReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"An easy-going, decent comedy.","reviewBody":"Thankfully for Chelsea Peretti's committed performance, "Spinster" succeeds at being different than most rom-com's even though it's script could've used some re-working.

In this comedy, after her boyfriend breaks up with her on her birthday, a woman tackles her fears of loneliness and what it means to be single.

An easy-going and sometimes funny film that really showcases Peretti's acting chops. I did feel as though "Spinster" lagged at some points and wondered if scenes could've been altered or re-worked. Some of the jokes didn't land as you'd expect them too but it's still a decent enough film to get through on a gloomy evening.

programme.title: Die Goldfische
Złote rybki
Die Goldfische
programme.desc: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietl. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Funny but predictable - still entertaining if you let it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1630,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-03-21","keywords":"disability,wilhelm scream","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Goldfische","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3829447705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDZiZjViMDctZWE0Mi00NDdlLThjYzQtN2Q3YWQ0NjEyMmE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771713/","name":"Tom Schilling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1678891/","name":"Klaas Heufer-Umlauf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3474804/","name":"Lisa Bitter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027692/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0239725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008261/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2285783/","name":"Alireza Golafshan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1487045/","name":"Justyna Müsch"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 7689310, Title: Die Goldfische, --- Description: Die Goldfische: Directed by Alireza Golafshan. With Tom Schilling, Klaas Heufer-Umlauf, Lisa Bitter, Sabrina Dietl. A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7689310/","name":"Die Goldfische","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTg2YTMyYjMtMTQ3Mi00OTU4LTlmMDEtYzQ2YjVjNWYxZDA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A good natured comedy about tax evasion and disability.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7689310/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp","dateCreated":"2021-05-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pricey fish","reviewBody":"Certain things may be hard for us as viewers to connect to. Not being a banker or someone who is detached from human interaction in general, it is not easy to fully identify with the main character here. And there are flaws or at least weird decisions along the way ... but it is a comedy and it tries to be as funny as it can be overall.\n\nThat out of the way, I had no idea what the movie would be like or any story element, so color me shocked and surprised by the inciting incident at the start of the movie. I did not see that coming/happening. After that "bang" the movie takes a minute to breathe a little bit and that is the moment you see the human in our main character. Overall we get quite a few of cliches though, but still it does its best to stay on the right side of funny and delicate when it touches certain subjects. Baby Done
programme.desc: Baby Done: Directed by Curtis Vowell. With Rose Matafeo, Matthew Lewis, Emily Barclay, Rachel House. Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9894660/","name":"Baby Done","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmUwMTEwYTQtYmUyNy00ZThjLWE5ZjAtZWMwZWRlNDc3Y2MzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTExNDQ2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Wannabe-adventurer Zoe freaks out when she falls pregnant to her long-term boyfriend Tim. As Tim embraces the prospect of fatherhood, Zoe attempts to rush through her dreams.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9894660/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"root_king"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting","reviewBody":"Interesting film, Unique but Nothing remarkable tho.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":993,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"pregnant,overalls","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2955985177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNlZDNmMmUtYTM4ZS00NjRlLWE2YTctNWM1M2ZhZTM0MzVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Zoe (Rose Matafeo) and Tim (Matthew Lewis) find out they are having a baby, they resolve to not let parenthood change them. Tim runs towards being a dad, while Zoe runs away from being a mum. Terrified that her life won't be her own anymore, Zoe is still determined to tick off a list of their wildest dreams before the baby arrives. Zoe's increasing denial about her impending birth pushes her, and her relationship, to the limit. BABY DONE is a semi-autobiographical story inspired by the filmmakers' own reaction to starting a family."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4194124/","name":"Rose Matafeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0507535/","name":"Matthew Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120593/","name":"Emily Barclay"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3555793/","name":"Curtis Vowell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0537672/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3089836/","name":"Sophie Henderson"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
Siedmiu wspaniałych
The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc:
The Magnificent Seven: Directed by Antoine Fuqua. With Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt, Ethan Hawke, Vincent D'Onofrio. Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404435/","name":"The Magnificent Seven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc0NTAyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk1ODA5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404435/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drjgardner"},"dateCreated":"2016-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The OK 7","reviewBody":"Come on now. If you're going to re-make "The Magnificent 7" let's do it magnificently. Where was that great music? Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. As they prepare the town for the violent showdown that they know is coming, these seven mercenaries find themselves fighting for more than money."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000243/","name":"Denzel Washington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0695435/","name":"Chris Pratt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000160/","name":"Ethan Hawke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0298807/","name":"Antoine Fuqua"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0479739/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0368074/","name":"Shinobu Hashimoto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0644823/","name":"Hideo Oguni"}],"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

If you're going to re-make "The Magnificent 7" let's do it magnificently. Where was that great music? Where is the superlative cast that include Yul Brynner, Eli Wallach, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, James Coburn, and Vladimir Sokoloff? You might argue that Denzel Washington and Chris Pratt are on a level with Brynner and McQueen, but I wouldn't. Pratt certainly has potential, but he doesn't yet have McQueen's star power. The rest are pale imitations, except perhaps for an unbelievably fat Vincent D'Onofrio who is certainly entertaining.

This is a modern re-telling. You might call it the Diversity 7. The producers threw in just about every minority you can think of – Mexican, Asian, Black, Woman. The only thing missing was a "little" person .

Personally I liked the idea of the woman, played very well by Haley Bennett who has been with Washington before ("The Equalizer").

An action film like this works only when the villain is villainous. Eli Wallach was terrific. Peter Sarsgaard wouldn't scare a fly.

Don't get me wrong. I enjoyed it. It's OK, but it's not magnificent.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":198595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"2016-09-23","keywords":"showdown,remake,industrialist,bounty hunter,gunfighter","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3980375833","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExOTYyNTAyMTheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NjE3NDkx._V1_.jpg","description":"With the town of Rose Creek under the deadly control of industrialist Bartholomew Bogue, the desperate townspeople employ protection from seven outlaws, bounty hunters, gamblers and hired guns. A sex and love addicted woman learns what real intimacy is when she starts making music with a reclusive man." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5926990/","name":"Unlovable","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzZjNDdjZjgtMWFjZC00MWViLWEyOGMtMGQ4ODJkODdiOGRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk0MzQ3MjU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sex and love addicted woman learns what real intimacy is when she starts making music with a reclusive man.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5926990/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"huyenchu"},"dateCreated":"2019-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lovable","reviewBody":"I've been wanting to watch this film for a long time now. I needed something to watch desperately this Friday evening and it got released on Prime.

I've randomly found Charlene's Xanga back in the day and was so instantly drawn into everything about her. She's very witty, honest, and original. She had this natural beauty inside and out and I've been a fan girl since.

I enjoyed everything about this film. They sure know how to make light of dark situations. I love the dark humor and the music in the film. I definitely believe in platonic friendships and how they can help save people. Throughly enjoyed John Hawkes and Melissa Leo, perfect castings and characters for the story. I'm just shocked I didn't start sobbing.

I hope Charlene continues acting. Such a raw exhilarating talent.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":504,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2018-11-02","keywords":"parents daughter relationship,brother sister relationship,brother caregiver for mother,sex scene,sex addicts' meeting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unlovable","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3214785049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDBmZTc0ZjctZGMwZC00NzU5LWEzNDQtMTJjMWZiNzYzMTlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDBmZTc0ZjctZGMwZC00NzU5LWEzNDQtMTJjMWZiNzYzMTlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2985910/","name":"Charlene deGuzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0370035/","name":"John Hawkes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502425/","name":"Melissa Leo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1151780/","name":"Suzi Yoonessi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152336/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2985910/","name":"Charlene deGuzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2262138/","name":"Sarah Adina Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0243233/","name":"Mark Duplass"}],"duration":"PT1H20M"}</script><metacontent="

Luźna znajomość
Acquainted
programme.desc: Acquainted: Directed by Natty Zavitz. With Giacomo Gianniotti, Laysla De Oliveira, Rachel Skarsten, Jonathan Keltz. After old acquaintances run into each other at a bar, they each begin seeing each other and question their own respective long-term relationships." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7089782/","name":"Acquainted","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU2ZmEyNjEtMDQ1Ni00ZmUzLWIzZGEtNzU2NTYwY2IyOWVlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE4NTI5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"After old acquaintances run into each other at a bar, they each begin seeing each other and question their own respective long-term relationships.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7089782/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yashinskydan"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Brilliantly bittersweet, and so real","reviewBody":"The people who I watched Acquainted with talked afterwards for hours about the people and the relationships in the movie. We had to remind ourselves it was a piece of fiction. One person said, "I've been every one of the characters in the movie at different times of my life." It's also wonderful to see the city of Toronto - usually a movie stand-in for mid-size American cities - come into its own in such a vivid, compelling way. The night-time, summertime walk in the park ... probably one of the longest tracking shots in recent cinema ... is so beautiful. Fine writing, deft direction, brilliant acting, and a cinematographer who knows exactly how to frame and film intimacy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":202,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-04-29","keywords":"couple,writer,florist,co ownership,text message","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5521198/","name":"Giacomo Gianniotti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5315658/","name":"Laysla De Oliveira"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0803896/","name":"Rachel Skarsten"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2827495/","name":"Natty Zavitz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0762690/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0602029/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651093/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2827495/","name":"Natty Zavitz"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

Tata

programme.desc:
Countdown: Directed by Justin Dec. With Elizabeth Lail, Jordan Calloway, Talitha Eliana Bateman, Peter Facinelli. When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10039344/","name":"Countdown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODY3OGEyMTgtYTZjZi00Y2YzLWFjY2UtMjEwYWE1MjRkOTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODQxMTI4MjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10039344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"questl-18592"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Countdown","reviewBody":"Countdown is one of those movies that aims big but never really gets there. It has an interesting concept, an app that can tell you when you'll die with unbelievable accuracy. That's fun, right? Unfortunately the concept, and the movie as a whole tends to fall apart if you look at it too hard.

To its credit, I'm not sure how hard it's really trying. It at times seems to take itself seriously and then at other points not at all. The performances are all... There. Nothing really great to report. Oh, and there's a lesson about sexual harassment as well.

At the end of the day, it's a blah horror flick. Not terribly memorable beyond the concept and, honestly, not worth spending the money to see it on the big screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30701,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-25","keywords":"violence,race against time,sexual harassment at work,boss sexually harassing employee,sexually harassed by one's boss","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2813181721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA1NWIxMGYtYzdhMC00Yjg3LWE1Y2MtNDAxYTE0YmM3ZGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA1NWIxMGYtYzdhMC00Yjg3LWE1Y2MtNDAxYTE0YmM3ZGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a young nurse downloads an app that claims to predict exactly

programme.title: Kto zabił Lady Winsley
programme.desc: Na niewielkiej tureckiej wyspie Büyükada zostają znalezione zwłoki poczytnej amerykańskiej pisarki Lady Winsley. Cieszący się uznaniem w swoim środowisku detektyw ze Stambułu, Fergan (Mehmet Kurtulus), zostaje oddelegowany na miejsce w celu zbadania sprawy. Piękna Azra (Ezgi Mola) pomaga mu poznać i zrozumieć pilnie strzeżone tajemnice tego zakątka kraju. Niebanalna historia z wątkiem kryminalnym. Zaletą filmu są kreacje aktorskie Mehmeta Kurtulusa i Ezgi Moli.

programme.title: The Browning Version
Wersja Browninga
The Browning Version
programme.desc:
The Browning Version: Directed by Mike Figgis. With Albert Finney, Greta Scacchi, Matthew Modine, Julian Sands. On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109340/","name":"The Browning Version","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk1ZTMxN2EtZWNjNy00NDg2LWEzYmItNTlhMmNmODNiMGZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murli786"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb!!","reviewBody":"Albert Finney and Greta Scacchi have given a fabulous performance. Indeed this is a rare gem in cinema. I give this 9 out of 10. The script is tight, the music score good and the performances are amazing.

Its a simple story of a school teacher who is forced to retire. He finds no comfort in his retirement as he is denied his pension and there is absolutely no one in the school who is sad to see him go. Living with an unfaithful life, this school teacher lives a lonely life. Never to bow down to anyone and nor letting anyone sympathise with him, he portrays a classic and rare case of a strong human being.

As i say this, it was sad to see him break down when a kid showers him a rare gift of love. If this movie does not touch your soul or move you, then you truly belong to the cold hearted. Keep a handkerchief ready.

Please watch this movie. It is a masterpiece .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3205,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1994-10-28","keywords":"preparatory school,teacher student relationship,school faculty,retirement,boarding school","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000627/","name":"Greta Scacchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000546/","name":"Matthew Modine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001214/","name":"Mike Figgis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052233/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711905/","name":"Terence Rattigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

Its a simple story of a school teacher who is forced to retire. He finds no comfort in his retirement as he is denied his pension and there is absolutely no one in the school who is sad to see him go. programme.desc:
Countdown: Directed by Justin Dec. With Elizabeth Lail, Jordan Calloway, Talitha Eliana Bateman, Peter Facinelli. When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10039344/","name":"Countdown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODY3OGEyMTgtYTZjZi00Y2YzLWFjY2UtMjEwYWE1MjRkOTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODQxMTI4MjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10039344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"questl-18592"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Countdown","reviewBody":"Countdown is one of those movies that aims big but never really gets there. It has an interesting concept, an app that can tell you when you'll die with unbelievable accuracy. That's fun, right? Unfortunately the concept, and the movie as a whole tends to fall apart if you look at it too hard.

To its credit, I'm not sure how hard it's really trying. It at times seems to take itself seriously and then at other points not at all. The performances are all... There. Nothing really great to report. Oh, and there's a lesson about sexual harassment as well.

At the end of the day, it's a blah horror flick. Not terribly memorable beyond the concept and, honestly, not worth spending the money to see it on the big screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30701,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-25","keywords":"violence,race against time,sexual harassment at work,boss sexually harassing employee,sexually harassed by one's boss","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2813181721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA1NWIxMGYtYzdhMC00Yjg3LWE1Y2MtNDAxYTE0YmM3ZGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjA1NWIxMGYtYzdhMC00Yjg3LWE1Y2MtNDAxYTE0YmM3ZGQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a young nurse downloads an app that claims to predict exactly

Kerosin
programme.desc: Kerosin: Directed by Yusup Razykov. With Valeri Maslov, Evgenija Molotova, Inna Stepanova, Elena Susanina. The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10146198/","name":"Kerosin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc1MzA1YmUtOTBjNS00ZmZiLWE0NGMtYmZmZTVlYjA2YzNlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjk1NzAxNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fantastic story about the power of simple people, capable of living and surviving in the most complex circumstances, about love, loyalty and beauty.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10146198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"from Porozhin","reviewBody":"Porozhin is a Russian village, like many others. One its people, an old woman, preserving the memory of his late husband, being happy when her daughter and granddaughter visits her, having need of a little pig in a sort of version of Pig story by Ion Creanga , punishing the killers of her granddaughter in a manner remembering The Virgin Spring by Ingmar Bergman , having the chance than a rich man being very generous with her. A film about Russia more than about a venerable woman. Beautiful in a sense than only by the Easterns can be understand, maybe defined. programme.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Lemony Snicket: Seria niefortunnych zdarzeń
Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: A Series of Unfortunate Events: Directed by Brad Silberling. With Jim Carrey, Liam Aiken, Emily Browning, Kara Hoffman. When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0339291/","name":"A Series of Unfortunate Events","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDM4NTg0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjI4MTczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0339291/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colonel_green"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bleakly funny.","reviewBody":"Before entering the theatre, I'd never glanced at any of the "Lemony Snicket" books. I'd never even heard of them. Having seen the film, I'll make it a priority to take a look. The film has a strong "Harry Potter" feel, what with the heroic, much put-upon British children, and the fantastical setting. If J.K. Rowling had cast Lord Voldemort as a nefarious villain out to steal the Potter family fortune, and made Ron and Hermione Harry's siblings, I imagine it would look something like this. Jim Carrey swallows huge chunks of scenery in his portrayal of Count Olaf, one of the most despicable villains to grace the silver screen in a while. The four child actors are all superb, especially the very attractive Emily Browning as the inventor, Violet. The film comes with a wonderfully disturbing climax, and a enjoyably happy epilogue that hints at many future misfortunes for the Baudelaire children. I'll be there. 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201268,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2005-04-13","keywords":"children,dark comedy,orphan,steampunk,uncle niece relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi513147161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797869/","name":"Brad Silberling"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330565/","name":"Robert Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1274516/","name":"Daniel Handler"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Allied
Sprzymierzeni
Allied
programme.desc:
Allied: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Brad Pitt, Vincent Ebrahim, Xavier de Guillebon, Marion Cotillard. In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3640424/","name":"Allied","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWEyMzg4ZWUtYmZhMC00Yjk2LWEyYjktODVmN2M3YTA2ZmNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2Mjg3OTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1942, a Canadian intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3640424/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dierregi"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classy story of war, spying, love and family","reviewBody":"A Franco/Canadian secret mission is an unusual twist for a WWII story. This and the setting of the first part of "Allied" reminded me of "The English Patient". Canadian Max (Pitt) is sent to Casablanca for a dangerous mission. Marianne (Cotillard) is the French agent already in place to help him.

Out of the desert and in London, "Allied" moves into a different territory, albeit still with plenty of style. Max and Marianne's wartime romance in exotic settings turns into a real family, but doubts arise about Marianne's identity.

London during the war as the main setting for two thirds of the movie looked very realistic. I did not mind what could be the historical inaccuracy of the Blitz, because the bombing added a layer of drama to the story.

I particularly liked the scene during the party, with Sing, Sing Sing playing in the background. It is a slightly menacing tune and it complemented perfectly the atmosphere of tension, suspicion and slight desperation.

Even if I have never been a Brad Pitt fan, he did a good job playing quiet Max, a man of a few words who sees his new world disintegrating. One can easily imagine him as a long-term bachelor falling for the beautiful, brave French partisan. Cotillard was also convincing as the ambiguous "femme fatale". Contrary to what some reviewers wrote, plenty of chemistry between the two, but also tenderness.

If you like movies with a solid plot, linear storytelling, believable characters, difficult choices, great costumes and soundtrack, then you should like this.

P.S. couple of remarks: Pitt's French was not the best and no way he could have passed for Parisian, but that did not bother me too much. The final scene is a couple of minutes too long, but again, not a major problem. However, what a relief to follow a good plot without the zig- zagging in time, overused but often useless editing style.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":148531,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2016-11-23","keywords":"nazi,spy,french,betrayal,world war two","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4001674777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MDQzMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4NzMyMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2MDQzMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTQ4NzMyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1942, an intelligence officer in North Africa encounters a female French Resistance fighter on a deadly mission behind enemy lines. When they reunite in London, their relationship is tested by the pressures of war."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182839/","name":"Marion Cotillard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364813/","name":"Jared Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0478951/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140275/","name":"Steven Knight"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fighting with My Family
Na ringu z rodziną
Fighting with My Family
programme.desc:
Fighting with My Family: Directed by Stephen Merchant. With Dwayne Johnson, Thomas Whilley, Tori Ellen Ross, Nick Frost. A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6513120/","name":"Fighting with My Family","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWM0NGUxMzUtMjRlZS00OWZlLTlkZDMtMzJhOWVmZDY2ODczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTQxNzM2MjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A former wrestler and his family make a living performing at small venues around the country while his kids dream of joining World Wrestling Entertainment.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6513120/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"markthomassintek"},"dateCreated":"2019-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style","reviewBody":"REVIEW - FIGHTING WITH MY FAMILY

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Rating 7 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74093,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-02-22","keywords":"jock strap on head,giving birth,young female lead,brother sister relationship,wrestling","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1699789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjNmNGI3YzktZWM4OS00NzY5LWI0M2UtNDkxZDM5MDVkZGUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103528/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0580351/","name":"Stephen Merchant"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

At first glance this film is a very British film and watching it I thought would American film goers even go to see it because it is very British, the humour, the accents, the houses but at the end of the film I actually realised the most important thing, something that isn't even being used for the promotion of this feel good film, it's actually a true story!

Yes an underdog from Norwich did win the Diva WWE championship belt, not once but twice!

Typical feel good film, made in the best of British style and Dwayne The Rock Johnson producing!

I will admit I was pleasantly surprised by this film and actually laughed out loud at a few of the British jokes included, because of this I now will have to eat my words and take back what I said at the start of this review, yes this appeals to British film goers and yes it will certainly appeal to American film goers also, good call Steven Merchant

Wersja Browninga
The Browning Version
programme.desc:
The Browning Version: Directed by Mike Figgis. With Albert Finney, Greta Scacchi, Matthew Modine, Julian Sands. On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109340/","name":"The Browning Version","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk1ZTMxN2EtZWNjNy00NDg2LWEzYmItNTlhMmNmODNiMGZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc3MjQzNTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the verge of forced resignation, a strict old-fashioned teacher rethinks his life.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109340/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"murli786"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superb!!","reviewBody":"Albert Finney and Greta Scacchi have given a fabulous performance. Indeed this is a rare gem in cinema. I give this 9 out of 10. The script is tight, the music score good and the performances are amazing.

Its a simple story of a school teacher who is forced to retire. He finds no comfort in his retirement as he is denied his pension and there is absolutely no one in the school who is sad to see him go. Living with an unfaithful life, this school teacher lives a lonely life. Never to bow down to anyone and nor letting anyone sympathise with him, he portrays a classic and rare case of a strong human being.

As i say this, it was sad to see him break down when a kid showers him a rare gift of love. If this movie does not touch your soul or move you, then you truly belong to the cold hearted. Keep a handkerchief ready.

Please watch this movie. It is a masterpiece .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3205,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1994-10-28","keywords":"preparatory school,teacher student relationship,school faculty,retirement,boarding school","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001215/","name":"Albert Finney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000627/","name":"Greta Scacchi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000546/","name":"Matthew Modine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001214/","name":"Mike Figgis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052233/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711905/","name":"Terence Rattigan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0367838/","name":"Ronald Harwood"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Platzspitzbaby
Dziewczynka z Parku Igieł
Platzspitzbaby
programme.desc:
Platzspitzbaby: Directed by Pierre Monnard. With Jerry Hoffmann, Sarah Spale, Luna Mwezi, Michael Schertenleib. Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9737798/","name":"Platzspitzbaby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIzZWM5MWUtZTZjNS00NmQ4LTljODktMmQ0Mjc2YzRkMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU1ODM0NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9737798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fxOCR"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing","reviewBody":"Made an account here on IMDB, just to recommend this movie. Apparently only ONE other recommended this? This is one of the best movies I've watched in a long time. I stumbled upon this movie by chance, and decided to give it a try. It was very much worth it!! I haven't watched any Swiss film before, at least to my knowledge?

It's absolutely amazing. The acting from both Sarah Spale and Luna Mwezi is sublime and extremely believable. At times it's really hard to get through, since the story revolving around Mia and her mom is very sad and somewhat depressing. The daily struggle of the daughter Mia, trying to help her mother, is very touching, although very sad.

I had to stop the movie a few times, just to get a break. Definitely cried through a lot of the tough scenes. I had to remind myself it's "just" a movie, but it felt very real.

Anyways, if you get a chance to watch this movie - I thoroughly recommend you should.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-18","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,coming of age,drug addicted woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Platzspitzbaby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1005371161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3768173/","name":"Jerry Hoffmann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1282623/","name":"Sarah Spale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457412/","name":"Luna Mwezi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1301190/","name":"Pierre Monnard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1825205/","name":"André Küttel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457413/","name":"Michelle Halbheer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11979752/","name":"Franziska K. IMDb data; ttnr: 9737798, Title: Platzspitzbaby, --- Description: Platzspitzbaby: Directed by Pierre Monnard. With Jerry Hoffmann, Sarah Spale, Luna Mwezi, Michael Schertenleib. Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9737798/","name":"Platzspitzbaby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjIzZWM5MWUtZTZjNS00NmQ4LTljODktMmQ0Mjc2YzRkMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU1ODM0NzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Spring 1995 - after the closure of the Needle Park in Zurich, 11-Year- Old Mia and her heroin addicted mother Sandrine are relocated to the countryside.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9737798/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"fxOCR","dateCreated":"2020-12-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Amazing","reviewBody":"Made an account here on IMDB, just to recommend this movie. Apparently only ONE other recommended this? This is one of the best movies I've watched in a long time. I stumbled upon this movie by chance, and decided to give it a try. It was very much worth it!! I haven't watched any Swiss film before, at least to my knowledge?

It's absolutely amazing. The acting from both Sarah Spale and Luna Mwezi is sublime and extremely believable. At times it's really hard to get through, since the story revolving around Mia and her mom is very sad and somewhat depressing. The daily struggle of the daughter Mia, trying to help her mother, is very touching, although very sad.

I had to stop the movie a few times, just to get a break. Definitely cried through a lot of the tough scenes. I had to remind myself it's "just" a movie, but it felt very real.

Anyways, if you get a chance to watch this movie - I thoroughly recommend you should.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-11-18","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,coming of age,drug addicted woman","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Platzspitzbaby","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1005371161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYzQyZTEtM2Y4My00MTg3LWI4MWItNWVkNGQ3YWQzNzUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3768173/","name":"Jerry Hoffmann","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1282623/","name":"Sarah Spale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457412/","name":"Luna Mwezi"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1301190/","name":"Pierre Monnard"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075448/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1825205/","name":"André Küttel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10457413/","name":"Michelle Halbheer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11979752/","name":"Franziska K. Kerosin
programme.desc: Kerosin: Directed by Yusup Razykov. With Valeri Maslov, Evgenija Molotova, Inna Stepanova, Elena Susanina. One its people, an old woman, preserving the memory of his late husband, being happy when her daughter and granddaughter visits her, having need of a little pig in a sort of version of Pig story by Ion Creanga , punishing the killers of her granddaughter in a manner remembering The Virgin Spring by Ingmar Bergman , having the chance than a rich man being very generous with her. A film about Russia more than about a venerable woman. Beautiful in a sense than only by the Easterns can be understand, maybe defined. A story with mythical embroideries about lonely life, survive, injustice and a form of profound peace. Maybe, an useful testimony. programme.title: A Series of Unfortunate Events
Lemony Snicket: Seria niefortunnych zdarzeń
Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: A Series of Unfortunate Events: Directed by Brad Silberling. With Jim Carrey, Liam Aiken, Emily Browning, Kara Hoffman. When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0339291/","name":"A Series of Unfortunate Events","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MDM4NTg0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjI4MTczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0339291/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colonel_green"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bleakly funny.","reviewBody":"Before entering the theatre, I'd never glanced at any of the "Lemony Snicket" books. I'd never even heard of them. Having seen the film, I'll make it a priority to take a look. The film has a strong "Harry Potter" feel, what with the heroic, much put-upon British children, and the fantastical setting. If J.K. Rowling had cast Lord Voldemort as a nefarious villain out to steal the Potter family fortune, and made Ron and Hermione Harry's siblings, I imagine it would look something like this. Jim Carrey swallows huge chunks of scenery in his portrayal of Count Olaf, one of the most despicable villains to grace the silver screen in a while. The four child actors are all superb, especially the very attractive Emily Browning as the inventor, Violet. The film comes with a wonderfully disturbing climax, and a enjoyably happy epilogue that hints at many future misfortunes for the Baudelaire children. I'll be there. 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":201268,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2005-04-13","keywords":"children,dark comedy,orphan,steampunk,uncle niece relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi513147161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDY4ZWFkZDQtMWFhMC00NzFlLTljMjQtYzI4MzMyMmIyMGQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797869/","name":"Brad Silberling"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004265/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0330565/","name":"Robert Gordon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1274516/","name":"Daniel Handler"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="
